item.title: BjHMGS1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: BjHMGS1 Gene Name: 3-hydroxy-3-methylglutaryl coenzyme A synthase Genome: Species: Brassica juncea Functional Descriptions: HMGS assays confirmed that Escherichia coli-expressed recombinant BjHMGS1 shows HMGS activity that is inhibited by F244, a specific inhibitor of HMGS.

item.title: CaCAF1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CaCAF1 Gene Name: CCR4-associated factor Genome: Species: Capsicum annuum Functional Descriptions: Capsicum annuum CCR4-associated factor CaCAF1 is necessary for plant development and defence response.

item.title: ClEXPA1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: ClEXPA1 Gene Name: α-expansin1 Genome: Species: Cunninghamia lanceolata Functional Descriptions: Overexpression of two cambium-abundant Chinese fir (Cunninghamia lanceolata) α-expansin genes ClEXPA1 and ClEXPA2 affect growth and development in transgenic tobacco and increase the amount of cellulose in stem cell walls.

item.title: ClEXPA2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: ClEXPA2 Gene Name: α-expansin2 Genome: Species: Cunninghamia lanceolata Functional Descriptions: Overexpression of two cambium-abundant Chinese fir (Cunninghamia lanceolata) α-expansin genes ClEXPA1 and ClEXPA2 affect growth and development in transgenic tobacco and increase the amount of cellulose in stem cell walls.

item.title: Cm-ERS1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: Cm-ERS1 Gene Name: ethylene response sensor 1 Genome: Species: Cucumis melo Functional Descriptions: Transgenic Lotus japonicus with an Ethylene Receptor Gene Cm-ERS1/H70A Enhances Formation of Infection Threads and Nodule Primordia.

item.title: CmLHP1A
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MELO3C006209 Gene Symbol: CmLHP1A Gene Name: LIKE HETEROCHROMATIN PROTEIN1 Genome: Species: Cucumis melo Functional Descriptions: CmLHP1 proteins play a key role in plant development and sex determination in melon.

item.title: CsCWIN3
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Csa3G777580 Gene Symbol: CsCWIN3 Gene Name: Cell wall invertase 3 Genome: Species: Cucumis sativus Functional Descriptions: Cell wall invertase 3 (CsCWIN3) plays critical roles in providing sugars during pollination and fertilization in cucumber CsCWIN3-RNA interference plants also showed affected seed development.

item.title: CsGT45
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CsGT45 Gene Name: flavonoid glucosyltransferase Genome: Species: Crocus sativus Functional Descriptions: Using degenerate primers designed to match the plant secondary product glucosyltransferase (PSPG) box we cloned a full length cDNA encoding CsGT45 from C.

item.title: EIF1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma.06G269600 Gene Symbol: EIF1 Gene Name: EUKARYOTIC TRANSLATION INITIATION FACTOR 1 Genome: Gmax_Wm82_a2_v1 Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: Our results indicate the potential of RPS28 and EIF1 promoters to facilitate future genetic engineering and breeding to improve the quality and yield of soybean, as well as in a wide variety of other plant species.

item.title: FaPE1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: FaPE1 Gene Name: pectinesterase1 Genome: Species: Fragaria ananassa Functional Descriptions: Concerning hormone regulation, auxin treatment increased FaPE1 mRNA levels in green fruit, whereas exogenous ethylene decreased FaPE1 mRNA levels in ripe and senescing fruits.

item.title: FvLOX3
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: FvH4_6g34960 Gene Symbol: FvLOX3 Gene Name: lipoxygenase 3 Genome: Species: Fragaria vesca Functional Descriptions: FvMPK6 phosphorylates FvJAZ12 at the amino acid residues S179 and T183 adjacent to the PY residues, thereby attenuating its nuclear accumulation and relieving its repression for FvMYC2, which acts to control the expression of lipoxygenase 3 (FvLOX3), an important gene involved in JA biosynthesis and a diverse array of cellular metabolisms.

item.title: FvYUC6
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: FvYUC6 Gene Name: YUCCA6 Genome: Species: Fragaria vesca Functional Descriptions: Functionality of the FvYUC6 gene was studied in transgenic strawberry overexpressing FvYUC6, which showed typical high-auxin phenotypes.

item.title: GmAOX2b
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GmAOX2b Gene Name: alternative oxidase 3 Genome: Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: A GmAOX2b antisense gene compromises vegetative growth and seed production in soybean.

item.title: GmAP1a
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma.16G091300 Gene Symbol: GmAP1a Gene Name: APETALA1 Genome: Gmax_Wm82_a4_v1 Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: APETALA1 (AP1) functions as a class A gene in the ABCE model for floral organ development, helping to specify carpel, stamen, petal, and sepal identities.

item.title: GmRR1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma.09g040000 Gene Symbol: GmRR1 Gene Name: a soybean type-B Response Regulator 1 Genome: Gmax_Wm82_a2_v1 Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: Soybean type-B response regulator GmRR1 mediates phosphorus uptake and yield by modifying root architecture.

item.title: GmSEP3
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma.20G153700 Gene Symbol: GmSEP3 Gene Name: Genome: Gmax_Wm82_a2_v1 Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: Glyma.

item.title: Gshdz4
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: Gshdz4 Gene Name: transcription factor hdz4 Genome: Species: Glycine soja Functional Descriptions: A novel Glycine soja homeodomain-leucine zipper (HD-Zip) I gene, Gshdz4, positively regulates bicarbonate tolerance and responds to osmotic stress in Arabidopsis.

item.title: HDA108
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Zm00001eb177560 Gene Symbol: HDA108 Gene Name: histone deacetylase Genome: Zm-B73-REFERENCE-NAM-5.

item.title: HvHNT1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: HORVU2Hr1G098820 Gene Symbol: HvHNT1 Gene Name: Histidine Triad Nucleotide-Binding Protein 1 Genome: barley cultivar Morex V1 Species: Hordeum vulgare Functional Descriptions: Our data suggest that HvHNT1 controls tiller development and leaf width through HvPPIase, thus contributing to understanding of the molecular players that control tillering in barley.

item.title: JcSEP3
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: JcSEP3 Gene Name: SEPALLATA3 Genome: Species: Jatropha curcas Functional Descriptions: An ortholog of the MADS-box gene SEPALLATA3 regulates stamen development in the woody plant Jatropha curcas.

item.title: LeAGP-1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: LeAGP-1 Gene Name: Arabinogalactan-protein1 Genome: Species: Solanum lycopersicum Functional Descriptions: Overexpression of tomato LeAGP-1 arabinogalactan-protein promotes lateral branching and hampers reproductive development.

item.title: LeERF2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: LeERF2 Gene Name: Ethylene response factor 2 Genome: Species: Solanum lycopersicum Functional Descriptions: Transcriptional Regulation of the Ethylene Response Factor LeERF2 in the Expression of Ethylene Biosynthesis Genes Controls Ethylene Production in Tomato and Tobacco.

item.title: LjIPT3
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: LjIPT3 Gene Name: isopentenyltransferase3 Genome: Species: Lotus japonicus Functional Descriptions: Knockdown of LjIPT3 influences nodule development in Lotus japonicus.

item.title: LrABCF1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: LrABCF1 Gene Name: ATP-binding cassette transporter1 Genome: Species: Lilium regale Functional Descriptions: LrABCF1, a GCN-type ATP-binding cassette transporter from Lilium regale, is involved in defense responses against viral and fungal pathogens.

item.title: MdBPC2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MD16G1012800 Gene Symbol: MdBPC2 Gene Name: Genome: Malus × domestica genome GDDH13 v 1.

item.title: MdSAT1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: MdSAT1 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Malus domestica Functional Descriptions: Apple MdSAT1 encodes a bHLHm1 transcription factor involved in salinity and drought responses.

item.title: MpNPR

item.title: MtbHLH1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: MtbHLH1 Gene Name: basic helix loop helix 1 Genome: Species: Medicago truncatula Functional Descriptions: MtbHLH1, a bHLH transcription factor involved in Medicago truncatula nodule vascular patterning and nodule to plant metabolic exchanges.

item.title: MtERF1-1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: MtERF1-1 Gene Name: B-3 Ethylene Response Factor Genome: Species: Medicago truncatula Functional Descriptions: The B-3 Ethylene Response Factor MtERF1-1 Mediates Resistance to a Subset of Root Pathogens in Medicago truncatula without Adversely Affecting Symbiosis with Rhizobia.

item.title: MtNOOT1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Medtr7g090020.1 Gene Symbol: MtNOOT1 Gene Name: NODULE ROOT1 Genome: Species: Medicago truncatula Functional Descriptions: The Medicago truncatula nodule identity gene MtNOOT1 is required for coordinated apical-basal development of the root.

item.title: MtPLP
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: MtPLP Gene Name: PETIOLULE-LIKE PULVINUS Genome: Species: Medicago truncatula Functional Descriptions: Identification and characterization of petiolule- like pulvinus (MsPLP) mutants with abolished nyctinastic leaf movement in the model legume Medicago truncatula.

item.title: NbBTF3
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: NbBTF3 Gene Name: basic transcription factor 3 Genome: Species: Nicotiana benthamiana Functional Descriptions: Silencing of NbBTF3 results in developmental defects and disturbed gene expression in chloroplasts and mitochondria of higher plants.

item.title: NbCMT3
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: NbCMT3 Gene Name: chromomethylase protein 3 Genome: Species: Nicotiana benthamiana Functional Descriptions: Virus-induced gene silencing of NbCMT3/3-2 in N.

item.title: NbNOG1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Niben101Scf02909g02010.1 Gene Symbol: NbNOG1 Gene Name: Nucleolar GTP-binding protein 1 Genome: Species: Nicotiana benthamiana Functional Descriptions: We characterized NbNOG1, a Nicotiana benthamiana NOG1 ortholog sharing more than 45% amino acid identity with Trypanosoma, yeast, and human NOG1.

item.title: NtGNL1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: NtGNL1 Gene Name: GNOM-like 1 protein Genome: Species: Nicotiana tabacum Functional Descriptions: NtGNL1 is involved in embryonic cell division patterning, root elongation, and pollen tube growth in tobacco.

item.title: NtMATE21
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: NtMATE21 Gene Name: multidrug and toxic compound extrusion21 Genome: Species: Nicotiana tabacum Functional Descriptions: NtMATE21 and NtMATE22, and demonstrate their role in flavonol transport and in plant growth and development.

item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: NtMATE22 Gene Name: multidrug and toxic compound extrusion22 Genome: Species: Nicotiana tabacum Functional Descriptions: NtMATE21 and NtMATE22, and demonstrate their role in flavonol transport and in plant growth and development.

item.title: Pta1-MMP
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: Pta1-MMP Gene Name: matrix metalloproteinase 1 Genome: Species: Pinus taeda Functional Descriptions: Pta1-MMP protein has the structural characteristics of other plant MMPs, the recombinant protein exhibits Zn2+-dependent protease activity, and is inhibited by EDTA and the active site-binding hydroxamate inhibitor GM6001.

item.title: PtaRHE1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: PtaRHE1 Gene Name: RING-H2 subgroup RHE protein1 Genome: Species: Populus alba x Populus tremula Functional Descriptions: Ectopic expression of PtaRHE1, encoding a poplar RING-H2 protein with E3 ligase activity, alters plant development and induces defence-related responses.

item.title: PtrbHLH186
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Potri.018G083700 Gene Symbol: PtrbHLH186 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Populus trichocarpa Functional Descriptions: Overexpressing PtrbHLH186 in Populus trichocarpa resulted in retarded plant growth, increased guaiacyl lignin, a higher proportion of smaller stem vessels and strong drought-tolerant phenotypes.

item.title: PtrXB38
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Potri.010G070800.6 Gene Symbol: PtrXB38 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Populus trichocarpa Functional Descriptions: Expression quantitative trait loci mapping identified PtrXB38 as a key hub gene in adventitious root development in Populus.

item.title: PuHox52
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: PuHox52 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Populus ussuriensis Functional Descriptions: PuHox52 promotes coordinated uptake of nitrate, phosphate, and iron under nitrogen deficiency in Populus ussuriensis.

item.title: PvWOX3a
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Pavir.8KG017200 Gene Symbol: PvWOX3a Gene Name: WUSCHEL-related homeobox transcription factor Genome: Species: Panicum virgatum Functional Descriptions: Overexpression of PvWOX3a in switchgrass promotes stem development and increases plant height.

item.title: Rht-B1c
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: Rht-B1c Gene Name: Genome: Species: Triticum aestivum Functional Descriptions: Sequence variations of the partially dominant DELLA gene Rht-B1c in wheat and their functional impacts.

item.title: ROX1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: ROX1 Gene Name: Putative ROX1 Genome: Species: Nicotiana tabacum Functional Descriptions: ROX1, a gene induced by rolB, is involved in procambial cell proliferation and xylem differentiation in tobacco stamen.

item.title: RPS28
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma.19G203300 Gene Symbol: RPS28 Gene Name: 40S RIBOSOMAL PROTEIN SMALL SUBUNIT S28 Genome: Gmax_Wm82_a2_v1 Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: Our results indicate the potential of RPS28 and EIF1 promoters to facilitate future genetic engineering and breeding to improve the quality and yield of soybean, as well as in a wide variety of other plant species.

item.title: SlbZIP1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Solyc01g079480.3 Gene Symbol: SlbZIP1 Gene Name: Basic leucine zipper transcription factor 1 Genome: Species: Solanum lycopersicum Functional Descriptions: Induced mutations in the SC-uORF of the tomato transcription factor gene SlbZIP1 by the CRISPR/Cas9 system led to the high accumulation of sugar and amino acid contents in tomato fruits.

item.title: SlCCD8
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: SlCCD8 Gene Name: CAROTENOID CLEAVAGE DIOXYGENASE8 Genome: Species: Solanum lycopersicum Functional Descriptions: The tomato CAROTENOID CLEAVAGE DIOXYGENASE8 (SlCCD8) regulates rhizosphere signaling, plant architecture and affects reproductive development through strigolactone biosynthesis.

item.title: SlCMT4
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Solyc08g005400.2 Gene Symbol: SlCMT4 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Solanum lycopersicum Functional Descriptions: CRISPR/Cas9-targeted mutagenesis of SlCMT4 causes changes in plant architecture and reproductive organs in tomato.

item.title: SlDEAD39

item.title: SlMET1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Solyc11g030600 Gene Symbol: SlMET1 Gene Name: Methyltransferase 1 Genome: Species: Solanum lycopersicum Functional Descriptions: In leaf tissues, mutations in SlMET1 caused CG hypomethylation and CHH hypermethylation on a whole-genome scale, leading to a disturbed transcriptome including ectopic expression of many RIN target genes such as ACC2 in leaf tissues, which are normally expressed in fruits.
